about_the_game:
Ten Bells is an anomaly horror game set in a timeless English pub. This unsettling escape room game draws you into a world of surreal anomalies and a hidden story, where every detail matters and the ghostly past lingers.

On Ten Bells:

  • “For real; W game no lie.” - CaseOh

  • "I started the game half-hearted and taking the p***, but by the end, I was fully tensed up and immersed. Nice job, Ten Bells!" - Yahtzee, SecondWind

  • "This Is THE BEST Anomaly Horror Game Ever Made." - The Outer Middle Show

  • "[Clapping on stream to 14m followers] This is one of the best anomaly games that i've ever seen." - Windah Basudara

  • "The SCARIEST Anomaly Horror Game..." - POiiSED

  • "The BEST Anomaly HORROR Game EVER Made". - SWOL

  • "I've played almost every single anomaly loop game out there, and I can safely say this one surpasses them all by an enormous amount." - Thorlar

Ten Bells is a Spot-the-Difference Anomaly Horror

  • Explore the eerie timeless pub

  • If you don't find any anomalies, progress onwards

  • If you spot an anomaly; go back the way you came

  • Evade traps and the inhabitants of the pub

  • Unravel the mystery through collected items 

  • Reach and eventually escape the Ten Bells

...if you can.

Over 55 Anomalies: Discover anomalies to progress and uncover the story. Anomalies can be subtle, surreal, scary or deadly.

Unfolding Narrative: Discover objects that contain story elements, helping you piece together the spooky tale of the pub’s ghostly inhabitants.

Play Time: Perfect for a captivating stream or a chilling solo session, with gameplay ranging from 20 minutes to an hour. Full game from 1 hour 20 minutes to 3 hours.

Will you escape the pub and uncover the dark secrets of Ten Bells? Scour the pub, find the anomalies, and experience the horror for yourself.

content_descriptors.notes: Ten Bells features themes of domestic violence.
